mapper.select: SELECT coss.id, coss.check_order_id, coss.shop_sku_id, coss.shop_sku, coss.inventory_quantity_new,coss.remark, coss.create_time, coss.create_by, coss.update_time, coss.update_by ,s.shop_name ,sku.sku ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(sl.location_no SEPARATOR ',') FROM check_order_shop_sku_storage_location cosssl,storage_location sl WHERE cosssl.check_order_shop_sku_id=coss.id AND cosssl.storage_location_id=sl.id GROUP BY coss.id) locationNos FROM check_order_shop_sku coss LEFT JOIN check_order co ON coss.check_order_id=co.id LEFT JOIN shop_sku ss ON coss.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id LEFT JOIN sku ON sku.sku_id=ss.sku_id LEFT JOIN shop s ON co.shop_id=s.shop_id where coss.check_order_id=#{checkOrderId} order by coss.shop_sku
